item.name: Decision Engine Service

request.description: Execute all enabled AI agents for a specific device/phone number. Includes Emergency Connectivity Agent, QoS Optimization Agent, and other registered agents.
Execute Emergency Connectivity Agent for guaranteed 5G connectivity (BR-1 through BR-7). Compatible with Emergency Connectivity Setup.
Execute QoS Optimization Agent to autonomously optimize Quality of Service based on real-time network conditions.
Execute Location Verification Agent to autonomously verify and manage location data for devices.
Execute Device Management Agent to autonomously manage device and SIM card operations based on network conditions.
Execute Healthcare Monitoring Agent to ensure reliable, low-latency connectivity for remote patient monitoring devices.
Execute Public Safety Agent to monitor public safety devices, environmental sensors, and optimize network resources for sustainability.
Execute Smart City Agent to monitor and manage city infrastructure devices (traffic lights, sensors, cameras) with guaranteed connectivity.
Execute Transportation Agent to manage connectivity for transportation systems, fleet management, and event logistics.
Execute Network Monitoring Agent to monitor network performance and detect issues proactively.
Get execution history for a device. Returns all agent execution results for the specified phone number.

List all registered AI agents including: emergency-connectivity-agent, qos-optimization-agent, location-verification-agent, device-management-agent, healthcare-monitoring-agent, public-safety-agent, smart-city-agent, transportation-agent, network-monitoring-agent

Get details for a specific agent by ID. Common agent IDs: emergency-connectivity-agent, qos-optimization-agent, location-verification-agent, device-management-agent, healthcare-monitoring-agent, public-safety-agent, smart-city-agent, transportation-agent

query.description: true to enable, false to disable

request.description: Enable or disable a specific agent. Disabled agents will not execute during agent orchestration.
Check AI agent service health and get agent statistics including total agents count and enabled agents count

item.description: Decision Engine orchestration and management endpoints. Includes Emergency Connectivity Agent compatible with Emergency Connectivity Setup (BR-1 through BR-7)
